edu.uw.cs.cse461.net.base

Class NetLoadable

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uw.cs.cse461.net.base.NetLoadable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetLoadableInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NetLoadable.NetLoadableConsoleApp, NetLoadable.NetLoadableService

    public abstract class NetLoadable
extends Object
implements NetLoadableInterface
    Base class for OS loadable classes. In addition to the methods shown here, each class implementing this interface must provide a constructor that takes no arguments.
    Author:
    zahorjan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NetLoadable.NetLoadableConsoleApp
      Interface for applications that run in console mode.
      static class  NetLoadable.NetLoadableService
      Interface name defined to make it easy to identify loadable services.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetLoadable

        protected NetLoadable(String loadableName)
        Every NetLoadable subclass must have a public constructor taking no arguments. It must invoke its immediate superclass's constructor, providing the loadable's name and whether or not it is implemented (both of which are known statically). If isImplemented is false, the loadable will NOT be loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • loadablename

        public String loadablename()
        Returns the name used to identify the loadable. Names must be unique, and may have global (cross-system) meaning. (For example, the instance for the RPC service should return "rpc".)
        Specified by:
        loadablename in interface NetLoadableInterface
        Returns:

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Called by the infrastructure when this loadable should shut down. Subclasses are likely to define more specific shutdown() implementations. For example, if they have started any threads, its important that those threads be terminated - otherwise, the application as a whole may not terminate. Subclass implementations should always invoke this implementation as the first thing they do.
        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface NetLoadableInterface

      • isShutdown

        public boolean isShutdown()
        Returns true if this component is shut (or is shutting) down, false otherwise.
        Specified by:
        isShutdown in interface NetLoadableInterface
